rules_text:
Haste
When Drifting Opportunist enters, you may discard a card. If you do, pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The arrival of the Wonderlands attracted the desperate and the curious, but most of all it attracted those seeking to take its power.[/i]
